column1: #text=I was riding my bike home from school one day when I went through a thorny patch of ground while going through the park .
#text=The tire then went flat after a few more minutes of riding and I was stuck a couple of miles from home .
#text=I called my dad and told him what happened and where I was .
#text=After a few minutes , he showed up with new inner tubes and a few tools to help me fix my bike tires .
#text=We started by removing the outer rubber of the tires and getting the damaged inner tubes out .
#text=Then we replaced them with new ones .
#text=After reinstalling the tubes and putting them back onto the bicycle , we had to inflate the tires which took a few minutes with a foot pump .
#text=Afterwards , he drove home and I followed on my repaired bike .
#text=I promised to avoid patches of thorns after that since it cost me 2 weeks of allowance to buy the inner tubes .
